dcterms:creator: M. Li
S. Chen
Z. Zhang
L. Xie
Q. Tian
Y. Zhang
dcterms:description: A widely used motion prediction dataset consisting of 15 actions performed by 7 actors. The human body is represented as 32 joints, and global information including global rotation and movement is removed. All samples are down-sampled to 25 frames per second.
dcterms:title: Human3.6M

dcterms:creator: M. Li
S. Chen
Z. Zhang
L. Xie
Q. Tian
Y. Zhang
dcterms:description: Another widely used dataset for human motion prediction, consisting of 8 actions and using 25 joints for each pose. The processing is similar to that of the Human3.6M dataset.
dcterms:title: CMU Motion Capture

dcterms:creator: M. Li
S. Chen
Z. Zhang
L. Xie
Q. Tian
Y. Zhang
dcterms:description: This dataset includes both indoor and outdoor actions captured at 30Hz, with each pose having 26 joints. The authors conducted experiments according to the official segmented training set, validation set, and test set.
dcterms:title: 3D Pose in the Wild
